item.title: Tree is damaged problem, 24th October
item.description:
No further details as the customer is not willing to provide any further information. I have explained the info from CDC has not passed this information on. Please see attached thread.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street light out in front of 11a and 11b Priory St, 24th October
item.description:
Street light out in front of 11a and 11b Priory St (already indicated on map). Combined with incomplete works under ref 11464935 from 14 Aug 24 has made this are of road/footpath even more dangerous.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 25, Priory Street, Fairview, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The cycle path along the landsdown road needs looking at no markings to say witch side they got to cycle on, 24th October
item.description:
All of the cycle path both sides on the lansdown road cheltenham
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 71, Byron Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
